meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 1 = 0.1 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial (12 o'clock position), '5' mark at bottom of dial (6 o'clock position). Dial number scale position: pointing between 8 and 9, approximately at 8.3. Clock position: 10 o'clock. Degrees: 300° (pointing UP-LEFT between 9 and 12 o'clock). Verification: Hand is pointing UP-LEFT ✓. Dial reading: 300/3600 = 0.083 m³. Total: 2271 + 0.1 + 0.083 = 2271.183 m³. Image is slightly blurry which affects precision of dial hand position reading.
